history.content: @571 and @581 should answer your questions. Please search through existing piazza threads before posting.

children.subject:
thanks, I looked at 571 but missed 581

somehow, I was not sure , if we have to provide some implementation detail (my though process on designing the hash function or bloom filter design choices) , how can I fit the answer inside the exact paragraph ?

But after going through the posts few times, I guess it should be fine if the paragraph size exceeds the layout expected by Gradscope .

history.content:
Hi @john turner  , 

Can you please clarify - if we need to fit the write-ups in the exact size of the paragraph in the template.

Asking this, as I noticed that when I select the question in Gradescope it automatically tries to find the answer in a specific area of 'submitted pdf page' which is same in size as the template .

In order to make Gradescope happy, I have actually omitted all implementation details , as I wanted to fit each write-up only in the specified size (1/3 rd of the page) 

Please clarify - if its not necessary to match question to pages in Gradescope, then I will submit a bit more elaborate answer with some implementation details.

Thanks much,

Kaniska
history.subject: Do we need to match the exact paragraph size for write-up as expected by Gradescope ?
